subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Lauren Cheney scored in the 61st minute and Hope Solo saved two penalty kicks as the United States beat Iceland, 2-0, in the opening round of the Algarve Cup in Vila Real Santo Antonio, Portugal.
snippet: Lauren Cheney scored in the 61st minute and Hope Solo saved two penalty kicks as the United States beat Iceland, 2-0, in the opening round of the Algarve Cup in Vila Real Santo Antonio, Portugal.
